data.text:
Awful experience. This is NOT a holiday resort hotel but a workers hostel.
The room was dark, oppressive and smelt of stale cigarettes. The pillows also had a stale smell.
The toilet seat had broken and was stuck back together the quality of finishes was basic. The kettle fell apart when we picked it up to use it.
The view from our room was directly onto the adjoining apartments therefore we had to keep the curtain closed all the time.
The photos on the hotels website have been staged and colour enhanced and do not represent the hotel at all.
Apart from the female staff, I was the only female in a place full of male workers. (This was confirmed when we spoke to a number of them.)
The staff ( apart from the front desk) were friendly but in no way did this make up for our stay in this place.
data.title: Not a resort hotel but a workers hostel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Jan,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We will thoroughly investigate and address each issue to enhance the quality of our services. We appreciate your valuable input and hope to have the opportunity to improve your impression in the future.

Best regards,
Hues Boutique Hotel
owner_response.author: Hues Boutique Hotel

data.text:
Nice rooms, nice lobby. Hotel staff not friendly at all but effective. Had a good sleep and a decent breakfast.

The location is nowhere near any points of interest, the area is not very clean and noisy at any time.
data.title: Good place in Deira

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Ggabi,

Thank you for your valuable feedback! We're delighted you enjoyed our rooms and breakfast. We'll address the areas of concern to ensure a better experience next time. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Best regards,
Hues Boutique Hotel
owner_response.author: Hues Boutique Hotel

data.text: Hotel is just average compared to the other hotels that we stayed this year. For  breakfast, only limited items were available. Pool is not that much great. Overall average experience. Service is good and behavior of staff was also very good.
data.title: Hotel review

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We appreciate your compliments on our service and staff. We'll certainly take note of your comments regarding breakfast variety and the pool to enhance the overall guest experience. We hope to welcome you back for an improved stay in the future.

Best Regards,
Hues Boutique Hotel
owner_response.author: Hues Boutique Hotel

data.text: Worst experience ever. Waited for 2 hours to get our room. Bad customer service. We called 5 times to get an iron and never got it. Booked a room for three and got a room for two only and they wanted to charge us for the extra bed. Wouldn't recommend it for anyone
data.title: Worst ever

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Waleed,

We sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you faced during your stay. Your feedback is invaluable, and we're committed to addressing these issues to improve our service. Thank you for bringing these matters to our attention.

Best Regards,
Hues Boutique Hotel
owner_response.author: Hues Boutique Hotel
